PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-08342011-07-29,  ,  ,  DFAIT,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectCosta Rica - Exchange of Information on Tax Matters ** RATIFICATION **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, or to delegate authority to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the AGREEMENT between Canada and the REPUBLIC OF COSTA RICA for the EXCHANGE OF INFORMATION ON TAX MATTERS.
AttachmentsAttachment
